page.title: 18AN HOTEL, Seaton Burn
page.content: Mr.Story, Miss Wood, Mrs.Hines answered our questions. Mr.Story likes being manager because it is an interesting job. There are 156 rooms and usually 180 people stay each day.There are often 300-350 visitors in a day. There is a swimming pool, restaurant, bar, games room, lounge, gym, and gardens for guests.They hope to get a climbing frame for the children and a tennis court for the adults. A room costs Â£42.50 or Â£52.50 per night but this includes T.V. free film, room service and a private bathroom. Some famous people have stayed there, for example Wham, Buck's Fizz, Status Quo, Alvin Stardust, Paul Young and Meat Loaf. They are all pop stars, football teams also stay there There are 30 cleaners, 26 waiters and 13 cooks.The daily income is Â£10,000 and their profit is 20%.
